305.sentence: finally , i reiterate my thumbs-down rating for t-mobile as a carrier .

306.sentence: their network coverage is very sporadic , and the network always seems overloaded , resulting in very unpleasant calling experience .

307.sentence: the nokia 6610 is a relatively new phone , and what a great phone it is .

308.sentence: after using it , i found the size to be perfect for carrying in a pocket .

309.sentence: it is just a tad small to hold to your ear with your shoulder , but that is solved with the very comfortable handsfree ear-piece which is included .

310.sentence: unfortunately , the 6610 does not offer voice dialing like my previous phone , but the other features it packs outweighs this shortcoming .

311.sentence: when i turned the phone on , the first thing that hit me is how good the screen is .

312.sentence: the resolution is very good and the colors are bright and even changeable !

313.sentence: the resolution is very good and the colors are bright and even changeable !

314.sentence: the ringtones included are awesome , and did i mention they were polyphonic ?

315.sentence: you can also assign special rings and graphics to special people when they call .

316.sentence: the phone also sports an image gallery ( with option camera attachment ) , a calendar / organizer , alarm clock with snooze , fm radio ( way cool , even if it is just through an ear-peice ) , games , java applications and gprs high-speed internet connection .

317.sentence: the gprs connection is sometimes slow , and writing instant messages with the included aol instant messenger software is a pain , but the other t-zones applications are quite useful .

318.sentence: the gprs connection is sometimes slow , and writing instant messages with the included aol instant messenger software is a pain , but the other t-zones applications are quite useful .

319.sentence: one downside : as of this writing , t-mobile has n't updated their t-zone system to fully support the 6610 .

320.sentence: all my questions or problems have been quickly and satisfactorily resolved .

321.sentence: the rate plans are also very good , at least for me .

322.sentence: this phone is highly recommended otherwise .

323.sentence: nokia makes a great phone , that 's clear .

324.sentence: with all its complicated features , the menus are easily accessible and the quality of the features is great .

325.sentence: with all its complicated features , the menus are easily accessible and the quality of the features is great .

326.sentence: the one huge disappointment is that the phones manufactured for t-mobile lack many of the menus and functions that a nokia straight from the manufacturer should have .

327.sentence: the internet functions of the phone - wap and gprs - will only work through t-mobile 's services , because they have deleted the menu options that would enable you to configure the phone to be used on a different network .

328.sentence: this phone is good with a huge array of features built into it .

329.sentence: this phone is good with a huge array of features built into it .

330.sentence: the design is sleek and the color screen has good resolution .
